references.paper_title: Oracle-efficient online learning and auction design

references.paper_title: Using confidence bounds for exploitation-exploration trade-offs
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant to the online learning setting in this paper as it introduces confidence bounds for balancing exploration and exploitation in multi-armed bandits, a core challenge in online pricing.

references.paper_title: Efficient algorithms for online decision problems
